definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: A lot of Occidentals feel puzzled to this question.
sentences.chinese: 許多西方人對此感到困惑不解。

sentences.english: I feel puzzled at his reply.
sentences.chinese: 對他的答覆我感到困惑不解。

sentences.english: His answers to my questions have only added to my confusion.
sentences.chinese: 他對我的問題的回答只是使我更加困惑不解。

sentences.english: The tv reporters looked slightly baff led.
sentences.chinese: 電視記者們看上去有些困惑不解。

sentences.english: Beg Yang Jian to stop to investigate this case, yang Jian also is bewilderment indissolubles very.
sentences.chinese: 求楊健停止調查此案件，楊健也很是困惑不解。

sentences.english: In real life, have a kind of appearance that indissolubles bewilderingly.
sentences.chinese: 現實生活中，有一種令人困惑不解的現象。

sentences.english: Every one was disconcerted by Natasha's behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 大家都對娜塔莎的舉止感到困惑不解。

sentences.english: The boy's unusual behaviour puzzled the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 這男孩的異常行爲使醫生困惑不解。

sentences.english: A lot of Occidentals feel puzzled to this question。
sentences.chinese: 許多西方人對此感到困惑不解。

definition: to remain puzzled after pondering over sth a hundred times (idiom)/to remain perplexed despite much thought
see 百思不解[bai3 si1 bu4 jie3]
pinyin: bai3 si1 bu4 de2 qi2 jie3

definition: to not know the reason/to not know what to do
anxious and perplexed/uneasy and confused/suspicious and fearful
to not understand/to be puzzled by/indissoluble
to be unable to make any sense of the matter/to be at a loss
not to understand the situation/unaware of the ins and outs
variant of 莫名其妙[mo4 ming2 qi2 miao4]
